## Installation

You can install the released version of imfeatures from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("imfeatures")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("bbuchsbaum/imfeatures")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(imfeatures)
## basic example code
im1 = "testdata/1_A_1.jpeg"
im2 = "testdata/1_B_1.jpeg"

```
